com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny
Class TextField

java.lang.Object
  ej.mwt.Widget
      com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny.TextField
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILabel, IObservable, IText, IWidget, ej.microui.Listener, ej.mwt.Renderable
public class TextField
extends ej.mwt.Widget
implements IText, ej.microui.Listener

This is a single line text field.

public ej.microui.Listener getListener()

Specified by:
getListener in interface IObservable
Returns:

setListener

public void setListener(ej.microui.Listener listener)
Defines which Listener to associates to the text field.
  • Each time the text is modified, Listener.performAction() will be called on the defined listener.
  • Each time the text selection is modified, Listener.performAction(int) will be called passing the caret on the defined listener.

Specified by:
setListener in interface IObservable
Parameters:
listener - the listener to set
